alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield; City of Richmond; Hanover; Henrico; King William (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 11:01AM EDT until June 12 at 11:30AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 AM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL CHESTERFIELD...CENTRAL HENRICO...SOUTHEASTERN HANOVER AND WEST CENTRAL KING WILLIAM COUNTIES AND THE CITY OF RICHMOND... At 1100 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Studley to near Richmond, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. These severe storms will be near... Mechanicsville and East Highland Park around 1105 AM EDT. Studley around 1110 AM EDT. Highland Springs around 1115 AM EDT. Manquin around 1125 AM EDT. Aylett around 1130 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Enfield, Central Garage, Richmond Heights, Hanover Airport, Midlothian, Elmont, Etna Mills, Montrose, Longdale and Westwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Chesterfield; City of Richmond; Hanover; Henrico; King William
